venue.address_1: 212 Hampshire St., 212 Hampshire St., Inman Sq., Cambridge
venue.name: Ryles Jazz Club

item.description:
Description from World Music Crash Arts Email:

Calypso Hurricane continues to entertain audiences with their special blend of calypso, ska, mento, reggae and original island grooves. Calypso Hurricane is Boston's longest lasting island groove jam band featuring classically trained muscians and full time Berklee College of Music professors guaranteed to put a smile on your face and spring in your dance step.

So great to see a calypso event! Come check it out!
item.name: Calypso Hurricane!
